name: Victoria Rader
what_you_do: Globally recognized transformational speaker, bestselling author, and founder of Quantum Personal Development™ who equips individuals, leaders, and organizations to thrive through AI-driven change.
business_focus: Empowering individuals and organizations through transformational coaching, speaking, and Quantum Personal Development™.

jv_history.partner_name: Grief, Grace & Growth: How Victoria Rader Turned Loss into Light
jv_history.source_quote: Rader is a globally recognized transformational speaker, featured in prominent media outlets like Forbes and CNN

who_you_serve: Individuals, leaders, and organizations seeking personal transformation and development.
offering: Transformational speaking, private coaching sessions, ThetaHealing® training, Quantum Freedom group programs, and bestselling books.
bio: Dr. Victoria Rader, Ph.D., is the Possibility Coach® and founder of YU2SHINE. She is a globally recognized transformational speaker, bestselling author, and founder of Quantum Personal Development™, with over 300 media appearances including Forbes, Fox, CNN, ABC, and NBC. Originally from Ukraine, she is dedicated to proving that everything is possible.
service_provided: Transformational speaking, private coaching sessions, ThetaHealing® training, Quantum Freedom group programs, seminars and events
signature_programs: Quantum Personal Development™, Possibility Coach®, Prosper mE (book), Empower mE, Light mE Up, ThetaHealing® Love of Self seminar, Quantum Freedom group
